DSCS Phase I Satellite Link, Configuration (1967) The control subsystem achieved an orderly allocation of satellites among the terminal pairs. The basic elements of the control subsystem are the SCCF, the Area Communications Control Function (ACCF), and the Earth Station Control Function (ESCF). The SCCF is the focal point of the control subsystem, and is collocated with the DCA Operations Center (DCAOC) in Arlington, Virginia.
